00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import roslib
00004 import sys
00005 import rospy
00006 import numpy as np
00007 from uav_utils import ThermalRise
00008 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb
00009 from math import floor
00010 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimSensor, Environment
00011 
00012 #######################  Altimeter Class  #########################################################
00013 
00014 class Altimeter():
00015         def __init__(self,name):
00016 
00017                 rospy.loginfo('Create ' + name +' Sensor')
00018                 
00019                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0)
00020                 self.rate =  rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0))
00021                 rospy.loginfo("\ta.rate: %.1f Hz",1.0/self.dt)
00022 
00023                 self.cp =  np.array(rospy.get_param(name+'/CP', [0.0, 0.0, 0.0])).reshape(3,1)
00024                 rospy.loginfo("\tb.position: [%.2f,%.2f,%.2f]", self.cp[0],self.cp[1],self.cp[2])
00025 
00026                 self.resolution = rospy.get_param(name+'/resolution', 0.001)
00027                 rospy.loginfo("\tc.resolution: %.1e meters",self.resolution)
00028 
00029                 self.maxvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/max', 1500.0)
00030                 rospy.loginfo("\td.maxvalue: %.4f meters",self.maxvalue)
00031 
00032                 self.minvalue = rospy.get_param(name+'/min', 0.0)
00033                 rospy.loginfo("\te.minvalue: %.4f meters",self.minvalue)
00034 
00035                 self.std_coeff = rospy.get_param(name+'/std_coeff', 0.1)
00036                 rospy.loginfo("\tf.noise coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff)
00037 
00038                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher(name, SimSensor)
00039                 self.states_sub = rospy.Subscriber('states',SimStates,self.StatesCallback)
00040                 self.env_sub = rospy.Subscriber("environment",Environment,self.EnvironmentCallback)
00041 
00042                 self.measurement = SimSensor()
00043                 self.realnew=False
00044                 
00045                 #Thermal Chracteristics
00046                 self.thermalMass = ThermalRise(name)
00047                 rospy.loginfo("\tg.Loading Thermal Chracteristics")
00048                 
00049                 self.airspeed = 0.0
00050                 self.temp=25.0
00051 
00052         def iterate(self,states):
00053                 Reb = quat2Reb(states.pose.orientation)
00054                 
00055                 if abs(Reb[2][2])<=1e-4:
00056                         self.measurement.value=self.maxvalue
00057                 else:
00058                         self.measurement.value=saturation((-states.pose.position.z-np.dot(Reb[2][0:3],self.cp)/Reb[2][2]),self.minvalue,self.maxvalue)
00059                 
00060                 rf_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.std_coeff,1)
00061                 if self.measurement.value<=self.minvalue:
00062                         rf_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.minvalue/3.0,1)
00063                 if self.measurement.value>=self.maxvalue-1:
00064                         rf_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.maxvalue/3.0,1)
00065                         
00066 
00067                 self.measurement.value +=rf_noise[0]
00068                 self.measurement.value = max(self.minvalue,floor(self.measurement.value/self.resolution)*self.resolution)
00069                 
00070                 self.tempOffset = self.thermalMass.step(self.airspeed,self.dt)
00071                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp + self.tempOffset
00072 
00073 
00074         def StatesCallback(self,data):
00075                 self.real=data
00076                 self.realnew=True
00077                 
00078         def EnvironmentCallback(self,data):
00079                 self.grav=data.gravity
00080                 self.temp=data.temperature
00081                 if self.realnew:
00082                         self.airspeed = np.sqrt(pow(self.real.velocity.linear.x - data.wind.x,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.y - data.wind.y,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.z - data.wind.z,2))
00083 
00084                         
00085 
00086 ###################################################################################################     
00087 #######################  Main Program  ############################################################
00088 ###################################################################################################     
00089 if __name__ == '__main__':
00090         rospy.init_node('bar_model')
00091 
00092         fullname = rospy.get_name().split('/')
00093         alt = Altimeter(fullname[-1])
00094 
00095         while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00096                 if alt.realnew:
00097                         alt.realnew=False
00098                         alt.iterate(alt.real)
00099                         alt.measurement.header.stamp=rospy.Time.now()
00100                 alt.pub.publish(alt.measurement)
00101                 alt.rate.sleep()
